name: Saner
description: Saner.AI harnesses AI to revolutionize knowledge management by enabling professionals, especially entrepreneurs with ADHD, to streamline connect, search, organize, synthesize, apply, and share knowledge in one intuitive, unified system powered by a personalized AI assistant.
one_liner: Saner.AI harnesses AI to revolutionize knowledge management by enabling professionals, especially entrepreneurs with ADHD, to streamline connect, search, organize, synthesize, apply, and share knowledge in one intuitive, unified system powered by a personalized AI assistant.
